name: Tank Commander
description:
Tank Commander is a single-player arcade action game built for Virtual Reality. Take command of a main battle tank and fight against various types of modern military hardware!

Turret Tossing Mayhem

Enjoy fast-paced arcade action while piloting a main battle tank!

Multiple Weapon Types

Engage enemies with cannons, machine guns, and grenades!

Try to save the world in Story Mode

Stop an evil military corporation from conquering the world!

Test your skills in Arcade Mode

Choose your enemies, map, and difficulty!

Modern Military Hardware

Fight against everything from kamikaze drones to next-generation battle tanks, IFV's, helicopters, and more!
